td.content: s:patient presents with 14 months history of Body Aches. patient is a white f lead worker aged 52 years. o:Height 70 in, Weight 100 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed amoxicillin - 500 mg 3x day, and ordered Lyme IgM antibody.

s:pt complained of severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye, severe poor night vision and severe difficulty reading. pt denied any fall or trauma. NKDA. patient is a 52 YO female. o:Height 69 in, Weight 96 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

tr.td: Westside Ear Nose and Throat and Facial Plastic Surgery Center

td.content: s:52 yo female lead worker presents with severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye x 5 weeks. pt also complains of severe difficulty reading, severe poor night vision, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. denies any alcohol use she does not smoke o:Height 69 in, Weight 98 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Multifocal Electroretinography.

td.content: s:white f lead worker aged 53 years c/o 10 days h/o severe difficulty reading. NKDA. she denies drinking alcohol she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 69 in, Weight 97 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15, Multifocal Electroretinography (+) Multifocal deficiencies of maculae on ERG a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:administered vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, performed Multifocal Electroretinography, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
